"A.P.242/3/16": "...Hey, you. What are you planning, bringing us here?"
"Don't be rude, Kyo! <%me> went out of their way to invite... us..."
"...Luco? That is you... right...?"
"...It is."
"Stratos, Kyo... it has been a long time."
"Luco...! I knew you were alive...!"
"Stratos... I have left you waiting... for so long..."
"I waited... the whole time...! So many hours, so many days, months, years! All that time!"
"...Even her deceased status has been rescinded from the database. And she's been reinstated to ARKS."
"...Lucotte."
"You have nerve to show your face around here again."
"Do you know what it is you have done?"
"The horrible ordeal you put your supposed friends through... Do you have any idea?!"
"...I do. I have hurt you both very deeply... I do not expect you to forgive me."
"Even still, I wished to apologize. For you two are my precious friends..."
"Enough...! You have the gall to still call us your friends?!"
"Then why have you not made any effort to contact us until now! Tell me your reason!"
"Thank you, Kyo. But... that's enough."
"I'm happy beyond words just having you back... Whatever happened in the past doesn't matter anymore!"
"...You do not wish to know? The reason this all happened. The reason I have not contacted you for years..."

"Yes... it's alright. It's not something you want to talk about... right? Then you don't have to.
We're friends, after all!"
"...Thank you, Stratos... I am so very sorry!"
"...Utter foolishness."
"That's right! I baked some cookies to celebrate our reunion. Here, Stratos."
"Oh, these take me back! They're your Peacekeeper Cookies! Kyo, c'mon..."
"Kyo...! What do you think you're doing!"
"Hmph... Do not resign yourself to this charade. Farewell."
"I'm so sorry! You went through all that trouble baking them. I hope you can forgive Kyo..."
"Please, bake another batch. Next time, we'll all have them together! As friends!"
"...Understood. Thank you, Stratos."
"It is thanks to you that I was able to reconnect with Stratos. I am truly grateful."
"Someday... surely Kyo too will..."
"Alright, Luco! How about we get that floor nice and clean?"
"Of course!"
